trans-unit.source: An endpoint that uses WS-Discovery to find the endpoint address dynamically at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Punkt końcowy, który używa protokołu WS Discovery, aby znaleźć adres punktu końcowego dynamicznie w czasie wykonywania.

trans-unit.source: When you use a DynamicEndpoint a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> is added to the binding you specify in the DynamicEndpoint constructor if not already present.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli używasz DynamicEndpoint <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>jest dodawany do wiązania, należy określić w Konstruktorze DynamicEndpoint Jeśli nie są jeszcze zainstalowane.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint.FindCriteria%2A> property enables you to describe the service you want to use.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint.FindCriteria%2A> and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> used by the DynamicEndpoint override these values specified in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint.FindCriteria%2A>I <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint>używane przez zastąpienie DynamicEndpoint te wartości określonej w <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint.FindCriteria%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint"> </xref> z określonego <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>i <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> — klasa

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that provides a discovery endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia obiekt, który zawiera punkt końcowy odnajdowania.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria"></xref> used to search for a service.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria"> </xref> używanych do wyszukiwania dla usługi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria> is used to describe the service to call.
